text: Nakazaniye, k kotoromu oni idut - vozdayaniye za ikh neveriye v Pisaniye Allakha, nisposlannoye im s istinoy. Te, kotoryye lyubyat prepirat'sya i sporit' mezhdu soboy, otstranilis' ot istiny, ne soglasivshis' s etim Pisaniyem, iskazili Pisaniye Allakha, ob"yasnyaya yego nepravil'no, konechno, okazhutsya v raskole
